com.aionemu.loginserver.network.gameserver
Class GsConnection

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.commons.network.AConnection
      com.aionemu.loginserver.network.gameserver.GsConnection

public class GsConnection
extends AConnection

Object representing connection between LoginServer and GameServer.

-Nemesiss-

public boolean processData(java.nio.ByteBuffer data)

Specified by:

This method will be called by Dispatcher, and will be repeated till return false.

Returns:

getDisconnectionDelay

protected final long getDisconnectionDelay()
This method is called by Dispatcher when connection is ready to be closed.

Specified by:
getDisconnectionDelay in class AConnection
Returns:
time in ms after witch onDisconnect() method will be called. Always return 0.

onDisconnect

protected final void onDisconnect()
This method is called by Dispatcher to inform that this connection was closed and should be cleared. This method is called only once.

Specified by:
onDisconnect in class AConnection

onServerClose

protected final void onServerClose()
This method is called by NioServer to inform that NioServer is shouting down. This method is called only once.

Specified by:
onServerClose in class AConnection

sendPacket

public final void sendPacket(GsServerPacket bp)
Sends GsServerPacket to this client.

Parameters:
bp - GsServerPacket to be sent.

close

public final void close(GsServerPacket closePacket,
                        boolean forced)
Its guaranted that closePacket will be sent before closing connection, but all past and future packets wont. Connection will be closed [by Dispatcher Thread], and onDisconnect() method will be called to clear all other things. forced means that server shouldn't wait with removing this connection.

Parameters:
closePacket - Packet that will be send before closing.
forced - have no effect in this implementation.

public GameServerInfo getGameServerInfo()
Returns:
GameServerInfo for this GsConnection or null if this GsConnection is not authenticated yet.
